cdm.baseDirHashTable: 0=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 1=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 2=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 3=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 4=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 5=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 6=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 7=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 8=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, 9=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, a=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, b=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, c=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, d=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, e=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm, f=${java.io.tmpdir}/cdm
cdm.mimeTypesJp2: image/jp2 jp2 JP2 jpeg2 JPEG2 jpeg2000 JPEG2000
cdm.formatRegistryKeyMapping: image/tiff=fmt/353, image/jp2=x-fmt/392, text/xml=fmt/101, application/arc-1.0=x-fmt/219, application/arc-1.1=fmt/410, application/warc=fmt/289, image/jpeg=fmt/43, image/vnd.djvu=fmt/318

norwayFonds.note: Podpořeno grantem z Norska prostřednictvím Norského finančního mechanismu

profile.MC1-1: Cblk={64\,64} Corder=RPCL Stiles={4096\,4096} Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{256\,256}\,{128\,128} ORGtparts=R Creversible=yes Clayers=1 Clevels=5 Cmodes=BYPASS Cuse_sop=yes Cuse_eph=yes
profile.UC1-4: Cblk={64\,64} Corder=RPCL Stiles={1024\,1024} Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{256\,256}\,{128\,128} ORGtparts=R -rate 6 Clayers=12 Clevels=5 Cmodes=BYPASS
profile.UC1-8: Cblk={64\,64} Corder=RPCL Stiles={1024\,1024} Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{256\,256}\,{128\,128} ORGtparts=R -rate 3 Clayers=12 Clevels=5 Cmodes=BYPASS
profile.UC1-10: Cblk={64\,64} Corder=RPCL Stiles={1024\,1024} Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{256\,256}\,{128\,128} ORGtparts=R -rate 2.4 Clayers=12 Clevels=5 Cmodes=BYPASS
profile.UC1-20: Cblk={64\,64} Corder=RPCL Stiles={1024\,1024} Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{256\,256}\,{128\,128} ORGtparts=R -rate 1.2 Clayers=12 Clevels=5 Cmodes=BYPASS
profile.UC1-30: Cblk={64\,64} Corder=RPCL Stiles={1024\,1024} Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{256\,256}\,{128\,128} ORGtparts=R -rate 0.8 Clayers=12 Clevels=5 Cmodes=BYPASS
profile.pdfImages: Cblk={64\,64} Corder=RPCL Stiles={1024\,1024} Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{128\,128} ORGtparts=R -rate 0.6 Clayers=12 Clevels=5 Cmodes=BYPASS
profile.custom: Creversible=no Stiles={1024\,1024} Corder=RPCL Clevels=5 Clayers=12 Cprecincts={256\,256}\,{256\,256}\,{128\,128} Cblk={64\,64} Cmodes=BYPASS

sip1.fileNameFormat: MC=MC_${uuid}_${index}.${ext}, UC=UC_${uuid}_${index}.${ext}, AMD=AMD_METS_${uuid}_${index}.${ext}, TXT=TXT_${uuid}_${index}.${ext}, ALTO=ALTO_${uuid}_${index}.${ext}, METS=METS_${uuid}.${ext}

repairSplitWithRename.description: rename with generate missing ALTO_PREMIS in IE-SPLIT

fileSystemOperations.exts: xml, tif, tiff, mix, jp2, jpg
